Definition.WordDefinition: Melissa, TX (city, FIPS 47496) Location: 33.28261 N, 96.57719 W Population (1990): 557 (250 housing units) Area: 4.2 sq km (land), 0.0 sq km (water) Zip code(s): 75454

Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Melissa \Me*lis"sa\, n. [NL., fr. Gr. me`lissa a bee, honey.] (Bot.) A genus of labiate herbs, including the balm, or bee balm ({Melissa officinalis}). [1913 Webster]
Melissa n : a genus of Old World mints of the family Labiatae [syn: {genus Melissa}]
